TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntitySetAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates the entity set to which a client data service class belongs.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Services.Common.EntitySetAttribute> class is used by the client during data binding to determine the name of the entity set to which a class belongs. This attribute is generated by the `Add Service Reference` dialog box when the Binding option is used and by the tool when the `/binding` option is supplied.
You must apply the <xref:System.Data.Services.Common.EntitySetAttribute> to any user-supplied client data service classes that are used with data binding.
<xref:System.Data.Services.Common.EntitySetAttribute> is only supported when there is one entity set associated with the type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string entitySet) cil managed

Docs.param: The entity set to which the class belongs.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the .
Gets the entity set to which the class belongs.
Docs.value: The entity set as string value.
